title: Toddler Killed in Tampa Shooting
content:
TAMPA, FL — The Tampa Police Department is investigating the Sunday afternoon shooting death of a 17-month-old child.
According to the agency, the incident happened around 4 p.m. Sept. 18 at the Clipper Bay Apartments, 6727 S. Lois Ave.
Police say the investigation is in its preliminary stages, but officers have released the cause of death as a gunshot wound. No other details are being released until Monday, including the name and sex of the child.
Image via Shutterstock
